t: Best Menswear on Amazon 2025: 42 Budget Style Upgrades | GQ
s: March 26, 2025 - And Amazon has a proper selection. Whether you’re looking for a hoodie, a crewneck, some sweatpants, knitwear or any other cozy-propagating clothing, there’s an answer over there, at multiple price points, too. For what it’s worth, we’re grateful for the variety: we enjoy a Hanes sweatshirt or some under-$20 Russell shorts just as much as that sweet, sweet Reigning Champ French terry, also below. ... Okay, fine...

t: Don't Let Amazon's Cheap Fashion Fool You
s: October 14, 2020 - While writing this, I also happened to remember that I did, in fact, buy clothing off Amazon once. It was a pair of knee-high socks for a Halloween costume. I wore them exactly once—for the costume—and then they disintegrated, unraveling after the first wash. That was fine for a costume, ...
